intro: Elattostachys vitiensis, commonly known as the Vitiensis Stamen Plant, is a flowering plant native to the Pacific Islands, particularly Vanuatu. It belongs to the family Meliaceae, which includes mahogany and other tropical trees. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are alternate and often have a distinctive venation pattern. Elattostachys vitiensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
